remarks: The Cartesian product of two neighborhoods is a neighborhood in the product topology.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jan-2018.)
statement:
neitx.x $e |- X = U. J $.
neitx.y $e |- Y = U. K $.
neitx $p |- ( ( ( J e. Top /\ K e. Top ) /\ ( A e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` C ) /\ B e. ( ( nei ` K ) ` D ) ) ) -> ( A X. B ) e. ( ( nei ` ( J tX K ) ) ` ( C X. D ) ) ) $.
